title: Jake Tapper | Trump Freaks Out About the Possibility of A Recession: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump freaking out about the possibility of a recession.

Then, Seth talks to CNN's Jake Tapper, who also takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for this podcast.
